mapper.select: select g.g_id, g.g_name, g.keywords, g.pic, g.brand, gd.p as price, gr.sales from (select g_id, min(price) p from goods_detail group by g_id ) gd, goods g left join (select g_id, count(deals) as sales from goods_record where year(record_date) = year(now()) and month(record_date) = month(now()) group by g_id ) gr on g.g_id = gr.g_id where g.state != 2 and g.g_id = gd.g_id
